scripts.prebuild:
if [ "$VERCEL_ENV" = "production" ]; then printf 'User-agent: *
Allow: /
Sitemap: https://www.knowbrainertrivia.com.au/sitemap-index.xml' > public/robots.txt; else printf 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /
Sitemap: https://www.knowbrainertrivia.com.au/sitemap-index.xml' > public/robots.txt; fi
